#summary Deadlock Monitoring

The deadlock monitor plugin in the tools [http://code.google.com/p/wt-commons/source/browse/#svn/trunk/tools tools repository] can be used to debug potential deadlock situations.  To use it, be sure to enable tracing (as shown below).
